::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
As Rodimus remains behind the heavy desk the Minion we=
apons fire strikes the wall behind him and the desk.
=A0
Rodimus gets Hydra=
s' message over the commlink. He makes a mental note to get right on that w=
hen he was done here.
=A0
When he finds his opening Rodimus pops up and fir=
es his wrist mounts in rapid fire. The energy blasts cover a wide area with=
 a strafing motion.
=A0
The tactics, aggression and firepower of Rodimus sh=
ould be quite the surprise for Scourge and the Minions as they think Rodimu=
s is an Autobot.

Dark Rodimus::

> Rodimus had been ready to be found. His should rocke=
t launchers were raised.
> =A0
> Rodimus: In the name of Primus, SHUT UP!
>=
 =A0
> Rodimus fires off four of his rockets at the wall and more specificl=
y the door. He then ducks behind the desk. The rockets should have no probl=
em blowing most of the damaged wall back.

The explosion seemed to catch Sc=
ourge and the sweep slightly off guard. Instead of a surprised Rodimus, the=
y found him ready and with missiles firing!

The missiles take out the rema=
ins of the door frame and shredding the wall. The resultant explosions knoc=
king the duo back.

"Full of surprises are we?" Scourge rasped as he quickl=
y came to his feet. "I always thought you Cybertronians were packing light.=
" 

Scourge smiled as the Sweep next to him also clambered to his feet also=
.

In unison they both dive behind some of the larger debris (ie consoles) =
and began firing energy blasts at Rodimus!

In the distance, in engineering=
 and the computer core four other sweeps hear Scourge's signal and begin ma=
king thir way toward the bridge.

Preston 
(Scourge & Sweeps)

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>As Rodimus remains behind the heavy desk the Minion weapons fire strikes the wall behind him and the desk.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus gets Hydras' message over the commlink. He makes a mental note to get right on that when he was done here.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>When he finds his opening Rodimus pops up and fires his wrist mounts in rapid fire. The energy blasts cover a wide area with a strafing motion.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>The tactics, aggression and firepower of Rodimus should be quite the surprise for Scourge and the Minions as they think Rodimus is an Autobot.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Mon, 6/30/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>
